metadata.title: CVE-2024-2201 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[x86: Native Branch History Injection]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-28-generic - 6.8.0-28.28
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-28-generic - 6.8.0-28.28
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-28-generic-64k - 6.8.0-28.28
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-aws - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-azure - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-gcp - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-ibm - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-25-lowlatency - 6.8.0-25.25.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-25-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-25.25.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-oracle - 6.8.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1003-raspi - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-oem - 6.8.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1005.12
No subscription required
